projects.title: OLX Buy & Sell
projects.description: A responsive OLX-style buy & sell web app built using HTML, TailwindCSS, and Vanilla JavaScript, powered by Firebase Realtime Database for instant data updates and Vercel for blazing-fast hosting.

projects.title: split-the-bill
projects.description: A bill spliting web app that let you split the bill between two people and can owe you and you can owe your friend money

projects.title: Notes
projects.description: A note-taking app with categories and local storage support.
